== Command-line access ==

The source for Repose [http://github.com/dflydev/repose-php lives on GitHub]. Use this command to anonymously check out the latest project source code:

{{{
git clone git://github.com/dflydev/repose-php.git
}}}

== GUI and IDE access ==

This project's Git repository may be accessed using many different [http://git-scm.com/tools client programs and plug-ins]. See your client's documentation for more information.
